item.title: TMUX Heart Ranger
item.description: Ranger is a console based file explorer that uses vim bindings. This makes it a very intuitive choice for any vimmer when they’re looking for a file explorer. I also use tmux and was wondering, if instead of replacing the whole ranger view upon editing a file, I could open them up in a newly split tmux pane. Here’s a quick snippet to configure splitting a tmux window into panes from within ranger.
